alert.note: Alert for Darlington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:44PM EDT until April 05 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FLORENCE...DILLON...SOUTHEASTERN DARLINGTON... NORTHERN MARION AND SOUTHEASTERN MARLBORO COUNTIES... At 644 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oak Grove, or 12 miles northeast of Florence, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Florence, Marion, Dillon, Darlington, Mullins, Latta, Quinby, Sellers, Fork, Blue Brick, Zion, Mars Bluff, Brownsville, Darlington Raceway, Florence Darlington Technical College Main Campus, Minturn, Oak Grove, Francis Marion University, Bingham and Mechanicsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for northeastern South Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
